source_sentence: 臨安府菩提教院比丘(善思　道諫)募財重刊正德三歲癸巳中秋日東洛乾蘭若密嚴比丘(玅辨)訂考重開板
translation: The monk at the Lin'an Prefecture Bodhicary School (Shansi Daoji) raised money to reissue the board on the third year of Zhengde's reign, the mid-autumn day of the Dongluo Qianrangyan Miyan monk (Jiban), who had set the examination and reopened the board.
